resources.string:
You are Gudha Mergé, the finest pilot on the block, and our only hope.
Your great-great-great-great-great-grandfather saved the planet from the Martian Invasion, sacrificing his life for everyone of us.
The Mergé strain runs strong in your blood, the power of your epic ancestors is with you. You have been raised and trained by the best tutor in the world, Laut ên-Bror, and now it is time for you to put your skills to the test.
Our world stands before its biggest threat so far, the Uranusian Incursion.
So get yourself together and start your engines, Mergé!
